channel.title: random rumination on Surfacedfox's Pages
channel.description: Recent content in random rumination on Surfacedfox's Pages

item.title: Random Rumination 1
item.description: Some days I look back, to dusty little toys. Resting by cold concrete walls, they seem to still provide an unfulfilled warmth in the button eyes, of an age long gone by.

item.title: Random Rumination 1
item.description: A strange wistfulness takes over me as the dimmed sun meets the heavy air of a quiet moment of hopeful despair
